verbose_text: Immunostaining for CGRP, a molecule expressed in a large number of CeA projecting neurons in the LPB in the pontine slices of rats with successful vector injection, indicated that CGRP expression, which was limited to the LPBE and KF in regions dorso-lateral and ventro-lateral to the scp, overlapped with EYFP expression in the LPBE and adjacent regions (XREF_FIG).
